summary: This is an email dated May 15, 2019, forwarding an update memo on the progress of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. The sender emphasizes the sensitivity of the matter and the need to keep the information on close hold due to covert efforts.

events.title: Epstein Investigation Status Memo Prepared
events.description: A status memo regarding the progress of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation was finalized, as indicated by the attached file name.

events.title: Covert Investigation Update Sent
events.description: An email was sent to distribute an update on the Epstein investigation, stressing the need for confidentiality due to the sensitive and covert nature of the ongoing work.

keyFacts: An update on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation was circulated via email on May 15, 2019.
The attached memo, dated May 10, 2019, was titled 'JE_status_memo_for ODAG.finaldocx.pdf'.
The communication stresses that the matter is sensitive and the investigation efforts are intended to remain covert, requiring the information to be kept on 'close hold'.
